mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA (NUM, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENTS, HIT, REGDATE, REF, STEP, DEPTH) VALUES (#{num}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{contents}, 0, now(), 0, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT Q.TITLE, Q.CONTENTS, Q.WRITER, Q.REGDATE, Q.HIT, Q.REF, Q.STEP, Q.DEPTH, QF.FILENUM, QF.NUM, QF.FILENAME FROM QNA Q LEFT JOIN QNAFILES QF ON (Q.NUM = QF.NUM) WHERE Q.NUM=#{num}
